Name: The Democrat
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
20 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel &/or mint sprigs.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with lemon slice &/or mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: The base spirit is inspired by Harry Truman, 33rd President, who only drank bourbon and is considered by some to be, "the last great Democrat."
History: Created in 2007 by Jon Santer at Bourbon & Branch , San Francisco, USA as " a kind of ode to the south - a democratic stronghold for so long. "
Nutrition: One serving of The Democrat contains 241 calories
